metadata.name: SIFT: POWER SUPPLY
metadata.description:
The Dirt Sifter discovers a rare power supply with enough energy to keep his Soul Drives running indefinitely... Unfortunately he activates a deadly  machine from the Old War in the process.   

Become part of SIFT by owning a piece of its origin. Proceeds from this collection go towards the development of the feature. Also owners will be credited in the film!

Written, directed, animated, edited, and starring Matteo Santoro.  
Director of photography: Dallas Sterling
Lili Grass: Ariel Diane King 
Rust Runner: Chris Radcliffe
Prop Design: Matteo Santoro, Bruce D. Mitchell 
Set Support: Duke DuQuesnay, 
Set Photography: Michael A Mendoza
